name: Superposition (Logic)
description:
Use the LMB to shoot, and scroll the mouse wheel up and down to changed the force you apply to the void square before propelling it. (this is displayed next to the void square).

MADE IN 2 HOURS AND 15 MINUTES (to get some creativity going)

Music: https://freemusicarchive.org/music/Doctor_Turtle (The Cirlce I went Round)

license for music: https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/

Robin x
